Name: Monster Gals!!
About the game: The Game Monster Gals!! comes with a special puzzle formula and 4 cute girls with animal ears and tails. But not only that, they have furry forms as well! Every Girl has a Gal Mode and a Mon Mode. Additionally, each one has their own Ero levels for sexual encounters (Base Game Censored). Features - Match the falling tiles. Make a mistake, and get a time penalty. - Unique artwork. - 16 Levels. - Levels gets faster and harder to complete. - Progress to unlock art in the gallery.
